section.title: Description
section.p: The IN (Interdiscipl'ry Note) action is the universal action for operations on Interdisciplinary Notes. This class contains attributes pertaining to the action (i.e., Attachment or Detachment) that was carried out for a given ID Entry.

stentry.p: The set of codes describes the action that was carried out for a given ID Entry. Possible valuesw are Attachment, Detachment., etc.
The Date and Time at which the entry was attached to (or detached from) its ID Parent.
The STATUS of the Entry at the time of the action
Identifies the Parent Document when the action occurred.
